sense.gloss: destination, address, place where you do something
rest (e.g. of a story), continuation, remaining part
last (i.e. immediately preceding), previous, ex-, former
before, earlier, previously, prior, ago, (minutes) to (the hour)
(the) front, frontal part, fore, head (e.g. of a line)
previous (e.g. page), prior (e.g. engagement), first (e.g. half), former (e.g. example)
front (of one's body or clothing), breast (of a coat, kimono, etc.)
natural, right, proper, just, reasonable, appropriate, deserved
naturally, as a matter of course, rightly, deservedly, justly, of course
the past, before, previously, former times
previous time, last time, previous installment, previous instalment, previous session
usual, common, ordinary, commonplace, the norm

sdata.j: 「↑以前↑↓いぜん↓にどこかで↑会↑↓あ↓ったことがありませんか」とその↑学生↑↓がくせい↓はたずねた。
sdata.e: Haven't we met somewhere before? asked the student.

sdata.j: ↑最初↑↓さいしょ↓↑着↑↓き↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑洗濯↑↓せんたく↓してください。
↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑名前↑↓なまえ↓はジャックです。
↑世界↑↓せかい↓はお↑前↑↓まえ↓↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓ってるわけじゃないんだよ。
sdata.e: The world doesn't revolve around you.

sdata.j: ↑出発↑↓しゅっぱつ↓する↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑電話↑↓でんわ↓するよう、↑彼↑↓かれ↓らに↑伝↑↓つた↓えてください。
sdata.e: Tell them to call me before they leave.

sdata.j: きみは↑午前↑↓ごぜん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓ずっとこの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓について↑考↑↓かんが↓えてる。↑休憩↑↓きゅうけい↓しろ、お↑昼↑↓ひる↓を↑食↑↓た↓べに↑行↑↓い↓ってこい。
sdata.e: You have been thinking about this problem the whole morning. Take a break; go eat lunch.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑後半↑↓こうはん↓というのは、ただ↑前半↑↓ぜんはん↓に↑会得↑↓えとく↓した↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だけで↑成↑↓な↓り↑立↑↓た↓っているのさ。
sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ここが↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑話↑↓はな↓した↑街↑↓まち↓です。
sdata.e: This is the town I told you about.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑部屋↑↓へや↓↑代↑↓だい↓を↑前↑↓まえ↓もって↑払↑↓はら↓うべきだ。
sdata.e: You should pay your rent in advance.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に「その↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を３↑日↑↓にち↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑済↑↓す↓ませたんだ」と↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: You told her that you had finished the work three days before.

words.gloss: last (i.e. immediately preceding), previous, ex-, former
